languages.text: {n}Джиневри задумывается, затем качает головой.{/n} "Мы проверим, но маловероятно, что преступник имел к нему доступ. Духи машин лифта наверняка подчинились бы лишь Лорд-капитану и ближайшим членам свиты".

traits.locale_text: "Это интересная мысль, Ваша Светлость. Если предположить, что преступник им воспользовался…" {n}Джиневри задумывается, явно взвешивая факты, но вскоре качает головой.{/n} "Мы проверим эту версию, но думаю, это маловероятно. Зная предусмотрительность Леди Теодоры, в него наверняка вшит протокол идентификации, который не пропустил бы чужака, не подняв на ноги полкорабля".

languages.text: {n}Jinevri thinks for a moment, but soon shakes her head.{/n} "We will look into it, but I think it unlikely that the culprit could have had access to it. The lift's machine spirits probably obey only the Lord Captain and the most trusted members of their retinue, and no one else."
languages.original_text: {n}Джиневри задумывается, затем качает головой.{/n} "Мы проверим, но маловероятно, что преступник имел к нему доступ. Духи машин лифта наверняка подчинились бы лишь Лорд-капитану и ближайшим членам свиты".

The lift's machine spirits probably obey only the Lord Captain and the most trusted members of their retinue and no one else."

{n}Jinevri thinks for a moment, but soon shakes her head.{/n} "We will look into it, but I think it unlikely that the culprit could have had access to it. The lift's machine spirits probably obey only the Lord Captain and the most trusted members of their retinue, and no one else."

"That is an interesting theory, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}. Assuming the perpetrator used it..." {n}Jinevri thinks for a moment, clearly weighing the facts, but soon shakes her head.{/n} "We will look into it, but I think it unlikely. Knowing Lady Theodora's foresight, there is probably an identification protocol built into the lift. No outsider would get through it, not without bringing half the ship down on their head."

{n}Jinevri thinks for a moment, but soon shakes her head.{/n} "We will look into it, but I think it unlikely that the culprit could have had access to it. The lift's machine spirits probably obey only the Lord Captain and the most trusted members of their retinue and no one else."

{n}Jinevri thinks for a moment, but soon shakes her head.{/n} "We will look into it, but I think it unlikely that the culprit could have had access to it. The lift's machine spirits probably obey only the Lord Captain and the most trusted members of their retinue, and no one else."

{n}Jinevri thinks for a moment, but soon shakes her head.{/n} "We will look into it, but I think it unlikely that the culprit could have had access to it. The lift's machine spirits probably obey only the Lord Captain and the most trusted members of their retinue, and no one else."

languages.text: {n}Jinevri se para a pensar un instante y niega con la cabeza.{/n} «Lo comprobaremos, pero dudo mucho que el culpable haya tenido acceso. Lo más probable es que los espíritus máquina del ascensor solo obedezcan a{mf|l| la} Lord Capitán y a los miembros más cercanos de su séquito, sin excepciones».
languages.original_text: {n}Jinevri thinks for a moment, but soon shakes her head.{/n} "We will look into it, but I think it unlikely that the culprit could have had access to it. The lift's machine spirits probably obey only the Lord Captain and the most trusted members of their retinue, and no one else."

traits.locale_text: {n}Jinevri se para a pensar un instante y niega con la cabeza.{/n} «Lo comprobaremos, pero dudo mucho que el culpable haya tenido acceso. Lo más probable es que los espíritus máquina del ascensor solo obedezcan a{mf|l| la} Lord Capitán y a los miembros más cercanos de su séquito, sin excepciones».

languages.text: {n}ジネヴリは少し考えを巡らせたが、すぐさま首を横に振った。{/n}「調査しますが、犯人がアクセスできた可能性は低いと思います。リフトの機械精霊が従うのは、おそらくロード・キャプテンと最も信頼できる従者のみで、それ以外の者には従わないでしょう」
languages.original_text: {n}Jinevri thinks for a moment, but soon shakes her head.{/n} "We will look into it, but I think it unlikely that the culprit could have had access to it. The lift's machine spirits probably obey only the Lord Captain and the most trusted members of their retinue, and no one else."

traits.locale_text: {n}ジネヴリは少し考えを巡らせたが、すぐさま首を横に振った。{/n}「調査しますが、犯人がアクセスできた可能性は低いと思います。リフトの機械精霊が従うのは、おそらくロード・キャプテンと最も信頼できる従者のみで、それ以外の者には従わないでしょう」

languages.text: {n}杰尼娃思考了片刻，但很快便摇了摇头。{/n}“我们准备调查一下这件事情，但我认为罪犯不太可能接触到它。这个电梯的机魂多半只会服从领主舰长本人与最亲近的随行人员，其他人无权访问。”
languages.original_text: {n}Jinevri thinks for a moment, but soon shakes her head.{/n} "We will look into it, but I think it unlikely that the culprit could have had access to it. The lift's machine spirits probably obey only the Lord Captain and the most trusted members of their retinue, and no one else."

traits.locale_text: {n}杰尼娃思考了片刻，但很快便摇了摇头。{/n}“我们准备调查一下这件事情，但我认为罪犯不太可能接触到它。这个电梯的机魂多半只会服从领主舰长本人与最亲近的随行人员，其他人无权访问。”

languages.text: {n}Jinevri überlegt kurz, schüttelt dann aber den Kopf.{/n} "Wir werden der Sache nachgehen, aber ich halte es für unwahrscheinlich, dass der Täter Zugang dazu hatte. Die Maschinengeister des Aufzugs gehorchen vermutlich nur dem Lord Captain und den vertrauenswürdigsten Mitgliedern seines Gefolges."
languages.original_text: {n}Jinevri thinks for a moment, but soon shakes her head.{/n} "We will look into it, but I think it unlikely that the culprit could have had access to it. The lift's machine spirits probably obey only the Lord Captain and the most trusted members of their retinue, and no one else."

traits.locale_text: {n}Jinevri überlegt kurz, schüttelt dann aber den Kopf.{/n} "Wir werden der Sache nachgehen, aber ich halte es für unwahrscheinlich, dass der Täter Zugang dazu hatte. Die Maschinengeister des Aufzugs gehorchen vermutlich nur dem Lord Captain und den vertrauenswürdigsten Mitgliedern seines Gefolges."

languages.text: {n}Jinevri s'accorde le temps de la réflexion avant de secouer rapidement la tête.{/n} « Nous allons mener l'enquête, mais je doute que le coupable ait pu y accéder. Selon toute probabilité, les esprits de la machine qui alimentent l'ascenseur obéissent uniquement {mf|au seigneur-capitaine|à la seigneure-capitaine} et à son entourage proche, et à personne d'autre. »
languages.original_text: {n}Jinevri thinks for a moment, but soon shakes her head.{/n} "We will look into it, but I think it unlikely that the culprit could have had access to it. The lift's machine spirits probably obey only the Lord Captain and the most trusted members of their retinue, and no one else."

traits.locale_text: {n}Jinevri s'accorde le temps de la réflexion avant de secouer rapidement la tête.{/n} « Nous allons mener l'enquête, mais je doute que le coupable ait pu y accéder. Selon toute probabilité, les esprits de la machine qui alimentent l'ascenseur obéissent uniquement {mf|au seigneur-capitaine|à la seigneure-capitaine} et à son entourage proche, et à personne d'autre. »

languages.text: {n}Jinevri, kısa bir süre düşündükten sonra kafasını sallıyor.{/n} "İnceleyeceğiz ancak suçlunun ona erişimi olması bence pek mümkün eğil. Asansörün makine ruhları, muhtemelen yalnızca Lord Kaptan'a ve maiyetindeki en güvenilir kişilere itaat ediyordur. Başkasına etmezler."
languages.original_text: {n}Jinevri thinks for a moment, but soon shakes her head.{/n} "We will look into it, but I think it unlikely that the culprit could have had access to it. The lift's machine spirits probably obey only the Lord Captain and the most trusted members of their retinue, and no one else."
